name: The dr & Monster
description:
The theme for the Weekly GameJam 203 was Eat the Enemy. It was implemented as a Pac-Man like game where you need to collect potions in order to eat your enemies or els they kill you.

Assets: 16x16 Dungeon Tileset by 0x72

Music & SFX: Migue.Gessaghi

Designed and created by: 1iGamer (part of DuoDevs)
